    • Method Detail

      • acquire

        public static ValueModel acquire​(java.lang.Class<?> valueType)
        Returns a ValueModel for the given valueType, if the latter is a value interface, or if it the heap or native implementation for some value interface, returns the ValueModel for that value interface.
        Parameters:
        valueType - a value interface or the heap or native implementation class for some value interface
        Returns:
        a ValueModel for the given value interface, or if the given valueType is the heap or native implementation for some value interface, returns the ValueModel of that value interface
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given valueType is not a value interface, or the heap or native implementation of some value interface, or the Chronicle Values library is not able to construct a ValueModel from this interface

      • fields

        public java.util.stream.Stream<net.openhft.chronicle.values.FieldModel> fields()

      • recommendedOffsetAlignment

        public int recommendedOffsetAlignment()
        Returns the recommended alignment of a flyweight bytes offset, to satisfy alignments of all the fields. It is the most coarse among all of it's fields' offset and don't cross alignments.

        Returns a positive integer >= 1.

        Returns:
        the alignment of the flyweight value itself, to satisfy fields' alignments

      • sizeInBytes

        public int sizeInBytes()

      • nativeClass

        public java.lang.Class nativeClass()
        Generates (if not yet) and returns a native (flyweight) implementation for this ValueModel.
        Returns:
        a native (flyweight) implementation for this ValueModel
        Throws:
        ImplGenerationFailedException - if generation failed

      • heapClass

        public java.lang.Class heapClass()
        Generates (if not yet) and returns a heap implementation for this ValueModel.
        Returns:
        a heap implementation for this ValueModel
        Throws:
        ImplGenerationFailedException - if generation failed
